item.title: Section 31: Release Date, Cast, Story, Trailer & Everything We Know About Star Trekâ€™s First Streaming Movie
item.description: Academy Award-winner Michelle Yeoh headlines Star Trek: Section 31, and here's what we know about Paramount+'s first Star Trek streaming movie.

item.title: Rise Of Skywalker's Rotten Tomatoes Score Suggests I'm Being Too Harsh On The Last Star Wars Movie
item.description: Despite the heavy criticism of Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker, this Star Wars sequel trilogy movie has a shockingly high Rotten Tomatoes score.

item.title: 10 Great Performances From Actors Who Came Out Of Retirement For One More Role
item.description: Plenty of actors have come out of retirement for at least one more role and ended up giving some of the best performances in their careers.
